data.title: Music & Memories Sunday, May 7, 2023
meta_keywords: funeral home in Sauk Centre MN
data.meta_description: Welcome to our website. We provide individualized funeral services designed to meet the needs of each family. Our staff of dedicated professionals is available to assist you in making funeral service arrangements. From casket choices to funeral flowers, we will guide you through all aspects of the funeral service.
data.text:
Music & Memories Radio Script

Broadcast for Sunday May 7, 2023

Covering the deaths from May 7-13, 2023

OPEN

Good morning and welcome to Music & Memories.

This is Linda Sue, and I am the grief specialist at Patton-Schad Funeral Home. It is my pleasure to bring you this week’s program on KASM. This program is our way of reaching out to help families deal with those difficult days surrounding the death anniversary of a loved one.

Change happens so slowly that it is hard to see without looking back. You have made progress in your healing. It may not be progress that you are acutely aware of, but it is there. Feel some pride today in the work you have done, and hope in what you will do moving forward.

This program is dedicated to the memory of:

Emily (Emmy) Schleppenbach who died May 4, 2020

James Trettel who died May 7, 2021

John Wolbeck who died May 7, 1993

Abner Jacobson who died May 7, 2019

David Winter who died May 8, 2011

Margaret Hellmann who died May 8, 2013

Leona May who died May 8, 2018

Wilfred Roering who died May 8, 1985

Juletta Kunstleben-Wolbeck who died May 8, 2001

Georgina Eichers who died May 9, 2010

Frances Rothstein who died May 9, 2000

Elizabeth Meyer who died May 9, 1992

Al Kerfeld who died May 9, 1976

Marcella Tabatt who died May 10, 2022

Richard “Tubby” Herges who died May 10, 2022

Evelyn Luethmers who died May 10, 2015

Pat Feldhege who died May 10, 2010

Francis M. Bauer who died May 10, 2005

Bill Rothstein who died May 10, 1998

Edward Douvier who died May 10, 1996

Sylvester Klemmer who died May 10, 1987

John Dinndorf who died May 10, 1982

Matt Persons who died May 11, 2014

Julianna Kahl who died May 11, 2009

Ann Zwack who died May 11, 1982

Theresa Gerads who died May 11, 1999

Caroline Kotz who died May 13, 2022

Arlene Bailey who died May 13, 2022

Haley Janshen who died May 13, 2022

Dorothy Marker who died May 13, 2022

Oscar Rueckert who died May 13, 2021

Gerald Thielke who died May 13, 2021

(MUSIC PLAYED HERE)

We encourage you as family and friends to show that you care by remembering these families, this week, with a phone call, a card, or a visit.

If you have someone you would like us to remember, you are welcome to give us a call or send us the name to our Melrose or Sauk Centre locations. You can also visit the “Music & Memories” page on our website at pattonschad.com and submit a name online. No matter how you send us the information we ask that you do so a couple of weeks in advance to ensure your loved one’s name will be announced on the correct Sunday.

At pattonschad.com you’ll find our latest obituary listings right on our home page and just below them is a link to join our obituary email list.

This has been Linda Sue for Patton-Schad Funeral & Cremation Services – Honoring Life’s Memories.

Thank you for listening and God bless!
